overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a diverse social media presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, engaging with a total of 3,580 followers. His content primarily focuses on research in social media analysis, coordinated campaigns, and information operations, attracting notable engagement with an average engagement rate of approximately 4.83% across platforms.
